mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, system_classification_level_2 AS systemClassificationLevel2, system_classification_level_3 AS systemClassificationLevel3, product_line AS productLine, product_tag AS productTag FROM t_system_product;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_system_product( system_classification_level_2, system_classification_level_3, product_line, product_tag ) VALUES ( #{systemClassificationLevel2}, #{systemClassificationLevel3}, #{productLine}, #{productTag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_system_product SET system_classification_level_2 = #{systemClassificationLevel2}, system_classification_level_3 = #{systemClassificationLevel3}, product_line = #{productLine}, product_tag = #{productTag} WHERE id = #{id}
